headline: As summer approaches, Duke Energy dedicates $200,000 to help low-income Hoosiers manage home energy costs
summary: Duke Energy Indiana is dedicating $200,000 to its Share the Light Fund to support customers facing financial hardship this summer. The funding aims to help families and individuals manage their energy costs amid rising temperatures and higher energy use.
